name: Dungeon Catering
description:
In Dungeon Catering, You play as a Chef explorer looking for their next adventure. In this top down shooter, you will explore procedural generated dungeons, collect ingredients from defeated enemies and use them to cook upgrades for multiple unique weapons that can be found. With each run, find and use different combination of weapons and upgrades to best conquer the challenges the dungeon presents. Best of luck Chef!

  • 3 procedural generated floors with their own unique boss at the end.
  • 3 different Chefs to choose from, each with their own starter weapon and ability.
  • 9 different and unique weapons to be found during each run.
  • 9 upgrade recipes that can cooked to enhance your weapons during your adventure.

Note: This is a student game made in about 4 and half months with a team of 8 people. Within the time given for development and the skills of all members of our team, We tried our best to deliver the best experience we could. Please forgive any bugs or broken game play as you play. Any feedback is much appreciated. Enjoy our game.

Developed by: Alejandro Ortiz, Brandon Bonno, Hunter Willis, Jenny Kline, Alan Mueller, Daniel Quintana Montejo, Jing Yuan, and Marcus Shaw
